name: lunar
description: Lunar is a headless eCommerce platform for Laravel developers. It offers advanced catalog management, custom product types, carts, checkout APIs, and a customizable admin interface for complete flexibility.
features: Headless Commerce: API-first architecture, Custom frontends, Flexible integration. Build any shopping experience.
Product Management: Custom product types, Variant support, Inventory tracking. Manage complex product catalogs.
Cart & Checkout: Shopping cart APIs, Checkout workflows, Payment integration. Complete eCommerce functionality.
Order Management: Order processing, Fulfillment tracking, Customer orders. Handle the entire order lifecycle.
Pricing Engine: Dynamic pricing, Customer groups, Promotional pricing. Flexible pricing strategies.
Admin Interface: Customizable dashboard, Product management, Order processing. Manage your store efficiently.
Laravel Integration: Native Laravel package, Eloquent models, Blade components. Built for Laravel developers.
Extensible: Plugin system, Custom fields, Event hooks. Extend functionality to match your needs.
